tickets.title: Reset Password
tickets.description: A user is requesting a password reset due to forgotten credentials.

tickets.title: User Added
tickets.description: A new user has been added to the system.

tickets.title: Remove User
tickets.description: A request to remove a user account from the system.

tickets.title: Slow Internet
tickets.description: Report of slow internet connectivity issues.

tickets.title: App Downtime
tickets.description: Notification of application downtime or unavailability.
